name: Christmas Horror (itch)
description:
ATTENTION: The game comes in a ZIP file.

Merry Christmas! 

 Santa Claus is ready to take over your soul and gain a few more years of life. He only needs two days to get all the resources he needs for the ritual, so this is your time to escape! 

You can escape on your own or finish off Santa, it's up to you, but we don't know how to finish him off yet... Just make sure he don't catch you or he will just make your life difficult.

Technical details: Christmas Horror is a FPS (first-person-shooter) where you must find a way to escape Santa's house using the scattered items around.

You have two ways of escaping and one way to finish Santa forever! As a child, you have severe limitations such as carryng only 1 item per time and of course, being slowly than Santa. Good Luck and remember, be a nice child and maybe he forgives you.

Click below if you wish to get your copy from Steam.
